article_title: Trump Says Heidi Klum “No Longer a 10”
article_text:
Never mind the immigrants, the latest person in Donald Trump’s sights is Heidi Klum.

According to a New York Times interview the Republican frontrunner did with Maureen Dowd (for some inexplicable reason), Donald Trump believes that Heidi Klum, a former Victoria’s Secret angel and one of the world’s most beautiful women, has lost some of her luster as of late. According to Donald, “she’s no longer a 10.”

Heidi, of course, thinks differently, and responded on Twitter…sans most of her shirt.

Trump has not responded to Klum’s comments. But I’m sure it’s only just a matter of time.
article_summary:

According to Donald, “she’s no longer a 10.”Heidi, of course, thinks differently, and responded on Twitter…sans most of her shirt.
According to a New York Times interview the Republican frontrunner did with Maureen Dowd (for some inexplicable reason), Donald Trump believes that Heidi Klum, a former Victoria’s Secret angel and one of the world’s most beautiful women, has lost some of her luster as of late.
Trump has not responded to Klum’s comments.
But I’m sure it’s only just a matter of time.
